item.title: 保诚金融因投资管理业务强劲而实现季度利润增长
item.description: 保德信金融公司周二公布，由于全球投资管理业务的增长抵消了美国的疲软，第四季度调整后利润有所增长。【原文：Prudential Financial reported a rise in fourth-quarter adjusted profit on Tuesday, as growth in the global investment management business offset weakness in the United States.】

item.title: 福克斯新闻称沃尔玛将裁员数百人并关闭北卡罗来纳州办事处
item.description: 据福克斯新闻周二援引一份内部备忘录报道，沃尔玛正在裁撤数百个职位，并关闭北卡罗来纳州的一个办事处，因为该公司正着手将员工迁往加利福尼亚州和阿肯色州的主要中心。【原文：Walmart is eliminating hundreds of roles and closing one of its North Carolina offices as it moves to relocate employees to its main hubs in California and Arkansas, Fox News reported on Tuesday, citing an internal memo.】

item.title: 朝日新闻》称日产和本田可能取消合并谈判
item.description: 日本《朝日新闻》周三援引多位消息人士的话报道称，日本汽车制造商本田和日产可能取消合并谈判，此举将引发人们对遭受重创的日产下一步行动的质疑。【原文：Japanese automakers Honda and Nissan may call off merger talks, the Asahi Shimbun newspaper reported on Wednesday, citing multiple sources, a move that would raise questions about the next steps for hard-hit Nissan.】

item.title: Match 预测年收入低于预期，任命新首席执行官
item.description: 由于用户减少了在约会应用上的支出，Match Group 预计全年营收将低于华尔街预期，这使得 Tinder 母公司的股价在周二收盘后下跌了 9.5%，该公司还任命了新的首席执行官。【原文：Match Group forecast annual revenue below Wall Street estimates as users cut back spending on dating apps, sending the Tinder parent's shares down 9.5% after the bell on Tuesday, with the company also naming a new CEO.】

item.title: 早间竞价中国重新开放，关税、盈利备受关注
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 高盛称中国报复性措施对能源价格影响有限
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）周二表示，预计中国政府针对美国对中国商品的新限制措施而采取的报复性关税措施对能源价格的影响有限。【原文：Goldman Sachs on Tuesday said it expects Beijing's retaliatory tariffs in response to new U.S. restrictions against Chinese goods to have only limited impact on energy prices.】

item.title: 消息人士称，桥水旗舰基金 1 月份上涨 8.2
item.description: 一位熟知内情的消息人士称，桥水联合公司（Bridgewater Associates）的旗舰基金 Pure Alpha 在 1 月份取得了 8.2% 的收益，在此期间，投资者遭遇了人工智能相关股票的抛售以及美国新政府的不确定性。【原文：Bridgewater Associates' flagship fund Pure Alpha posted a gain of 8.2% in January, in a period when investors navigated a sell-off in AI-related stocks and uncertainties around the incoming U.S. administration, a source familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 蒙迪艾尔第四季度营收不及预期
item.description: 周二，吉百利母公司蒙迪艾尔国际公司（Mondelez International）第四季度营收不及华尔街预期，原因是其巧克力和饼干价格上涨损害了关键假日季节的需求。【原文：Cadbury-parent Mondelez International missed Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter revenue on Tuesday, as higher prices for its chocolates and biscuits hurt demand during the crucial holiday season.】

item.title: AMD 预测第一季度营收高于预期
item.description: 先进微设备公司（Advanced Micro Devices）周二预测第一季度营收将超过华尔街预期，押注于人工智能芯片的强劲需求，因为华尔街的科技巨头们正在建设基础设施，以主导这一新兴技术。【原文：Advanced Micro Devices forecast first-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, betting on strong demand for its AI chips as Wall Street's technology heavyweights build infrastructure to dominate the emerging technology.】

item.title: Chipotle 墨西哥烤肉店报告季度销售额增幅低于预期
item.description: 周二，Chipotle Mexican Grill 公司报告称，第四季度可比销售额的增幅低于预期，原因是菜单价格上涨，使有预算意识的消费者不愿选择其饭碗和卷饼。【原文：Chipotle Mexican Grill reported a smaller-than-expected rise in fourth-quarter comparable sales on Tuesday, as higher menu prices deter budget-conscious consumers from opting for its rice bowls and burritos.】

item.title: Snap利润超预期，广告平台表现强劲
item.description: 受益于 Snapchat 母公司广告平台的改进，Snap 周二的季度利润超过了华尔街预期。【原文：Snap beat Wall Street estimates for quarterly profit on Tuesday, benefiting from improvements to the Snapchat parent's advertising platform.】

item.title: 谷歌母公司 Alphabet 季度营收不及预期
item.description: Alphabet 周二未能达到华尔街对其季度营收的预期，这表明谷歌母公司正受到数字广告市场竞争加剧和云计算业务放缓的冲击。【原文：Alphabet missed Wall Street estimates for quarterly revenue on Tuesday, in a sign the Google parent was taking a hit from increased competition in the digital advertising market and a slowdown in its cloud computing business.】

item.title: 游戏玩家支出疲软，EA 预计第四季度业绩低于预期
item.description: 电子艺界（Electronic Arts）周二预测，第四季度预订额将低于华尔街预期，这家电子游戏发行商正在努力应对其热门足球特许经营项目支出放缓的问题。【原文：Electronic Arts forecast fourth-quarter bookings below Wall Street expectations on Tuesday, as the videogame publisher grapples with a slowdown in spending at its popular soccer franchise.】

item.title: 芭比娃娃母公司美泰预计，假日销售稳定后，全年利润将高于预期
item.description: 玩具制造商美泰（Mattel）周二预测全年利润将超过华尔街预期，此前该公司假日季度销售额超过预期，主要得益于对动作人偶和风火轮汽车的稳定需求，盘后股价上涨近 8%。【原文：Toymaker Mattel on Tuesday forecast full-year profit above Wall Street expectations after beating holiday quarter sales estimates, helped by stable demand for its action figures and Hot Wheels vehicles, sending its shares up nearly 8% after the bell.】

item.title: 安进公司利润超预期，下一项 MariTide 研究将于年中启动
item.description: 安进公司周二公布，受产品销售额增长11%的推动，该公司的季度利润有所增长，并表示将在年中之前开始对关键的肥胖症候选药物MariTide进行后期研究，但监管机构已经暂停了另一种实验性减肥药物的早期试验。【原文：Amgen posted a higher quarterly profit on Tuesday, driven by an 11% rise in product sales, and said late-stage studies of key obesity drug candidate MariTide will start before mid-year but regulators have placed a hold on an early-stage trial of a different experimental weight-loss drug.】

item.title: 与中国的贸易战为美国新液化天然气项目蒙上阴影
item.description: 据分析师、业内人士和公司文件显示，唐纳德-特朗普总统与中国政府之间新出现的贸易战对美国计划中的数十亿美元液化天然气出口项目构成了新的威胁，其中许多项目都依赖中国作为主要买家。【原文：President Donald Trump's emerging trade war with Beijing poses a new threat to billions of dollars in planned U.S. liquefied natural gas export projects, many of which rely on China as a key buyer, according to analysts, industry sources, and company filings.】

item.title: 路透社/益普索民意调查显示，大多数美国人反对特朗普寻求的国内支出冻结措施
item.description: 据路透社/益普索周二公布的最新民调显示，大多数美国人反对唐纳德-特朗普总统寻求的暂时冻结国内联邦支出，但对削减对外援助的支持率较高。【原文：Most Americans oppose a temporary freeze on domestic federal spending as sought by President Donald Trump, but support is higher for cutting foreign aid, according to a new Reuters/Ipsos poll released on Tuesday.】

item.title: 如果美国实施关税，加拿大跨山公司预计会对管道系统产生更多兴趣
item.description: 加拿大输油管道运营商跨山公司表示，如果美国在一个月内对加拿大进口石油征收关税，该公司预计对其输油系统的兴趣会增加。【原文：Canadian pipeline operator Trans Mountain said it expects to see increased interest to ship on its system if the United States slaps tariffs on Canadian oil imports in a month.】

item.title: 贸易紧张局势和生物燃料政策为 ADM 2025 年前景蒙上阴影
item.description: 全球谷物贸易商阿彻-丹尼尔斯-米德兰公司（Archer-Daniels-Midland）周二表示，该公司正在削减成本和裁员，以应对因美国生物燃料政策的不确定性和酝酿中的贸易战而变得更具挑战性的大宗商品低迷。【原文：Global grains trader Archer-Daniels-Midland is slashing costs and cutting staff to weather a commodity downturn made more challenging by uncertainty about U.S. biofuels policies and a brewing trade war, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 马斯克效应？一月份特斯拉在欧洲五个市场的销量下滑
item.description: 特斯拉 1 月份在包括英国和法国在内的五个欧洲国家的销售额下降，原因是电动汽车制造商的竞争对手们推出了更新的车型，而民意调查显示，公众舆论对首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的看法也在变坏。【原文：Tesla posted lower sales across five European countries in January, including the United Kingdom and France, as competitors with newer models gained on the electric vehicle maker and polls show public opinion souring on CEO Elon Musk.】

item.title: 禽流感促使连锁餐厅华夫饼屋（Waffle House）对每个鸡蛋加收 50 美分的费用
item.description: 美国连锁餐厅华夫饼屋（Waffle House）周一在其餐厅张贴的一份声明中说，该公司已对顾客点的每一个鸡蛋加收 50 美分的附加费。【原文：U.S. diner chain Waffle House has added a 50-cent surcharge for every egg in a customer’s order, the company said in a statement posted in its restaurants on Monday.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，恩西诺公司的所有者正在考虑以 70 亿美元出售能源生产商并进行首次公开募股
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，加拿大养老基金 CPP Investments 正在权衡各种战略选择，包括出售或首次公开募股，对 Encino Acquisition Partners 的估值可能高达 70 亿美元（包括债务）。【原文：Canadian pension fund CPP Investments is weighing strategic options, including a sale or initial public offering, for Encino Acquisition Partners that could value the U.S. oil and natural gas producer at as much as $7 billion, including debt, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 美国批准向埃及出售洛克希德和诺斯罗普-格鲁曼系统的可能性
item.description: 五角大楼国防安全合作局周二表示，美国国务院已批准向埃及出售洛克希德-马丁公司和诺斯罗普-格鲁曼公司的防御系统。【原文：The U.S. State Department has approved the potential sale of Lockheed Martin and Northrop Grumman Corp's defense systems to Egypt, the Pentagon's Defense Security Cooperation Agency said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国国会将成立加密货币工作组
item.description: 美国众议院金融服务委员会主席、共和党人弗伦奇-希尔（French Hill）周二表示，国会参众两院的立法者将成立一个工作组，制定有利于数字资产发展的政策。【原文：U.S. Representative French Hill, a Republican who chairs the House Financial Services Committee, said on Tuesday lawmakers from both chambers of congress would form a working group to develop policy favoring development of digital assets.】

item.title: Third Point 的勒布在信中表示，预计股票投资环境良好
item.description: 亿万富翁投资人丹尼尔-勒布（Daniel Loeb）打赌，尽管特朗普政府在宣布和颁布新政策时采取了 "非常规 "的做法，但2025年将带来更有利的股票投资环境。【原文：Billionaire investor Daniel Loeb is betting 2025 will bring a more favorable stock investing environment despite the Trump administration's "unconventional" approach to announcing and enacting new policies.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，摩根士丹利将增加出售与马斯克 X 有关的贷款
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二报道，以摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）为首的一批银行将增加出售与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的社交媒体平台 X 有关的贷款，因为投资者的需求强于预期。【原文：A group of Morgan Stanley-led banks is set to increase a sale of loans tied to Elon Musk's social media platform X after receiving stronger-than-expected demand from investors, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 备忘录称高盛将请回技术银行家尼克-乔瓦尼
item.description: 根据路透社周二看到的一份内部备忘录，高盛将重新启用尼克-乔瓦尼（Nick Giovanni），他之前在这家华尔街巨头工作了 20 多年。【原文：Goldman Sachs is bringing back Nick Giovanni, who spent more than 20 years at the Wall Street giant in a prior stint, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 波音高管称供应商 Spirit Aero 拥有大量 737 机身库存
item.description: 波音公司的主要供应商 Spirit AeroSystems 公司的一位高管周二在西雅图举行的一次航空航天会议上说，该公司拥有大量质量大幅提高的 737 机身库存，随时可以发货。【原文：Boeing's key supplier Spirit AeroSystems has a substantial inventory of 737 fuselages of significantly improved quality that are ready to ship, an executive with the planemaker told a Seattle aerospace conference on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国商品期货交易委员会代理主席重组该机构的执法部门
item.description: 美国商品期货交易委员会（CFTC）代理主席周二表示，该委员会将重组其执法部门的特别工作组，以结束 "执法监管"，转而专注于打击欺诈和帮助受害者。【原文：The U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission will reorganize its Division of Enforcement's task forces to end "regulation by enforcement" and instead focus on combating fraud and helping victims, CFTC's acting chairman said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国博彩协会称，美国人预计将在超级碗上合法投注 13.9 亿美元
item.description: 美国博彩协会（American Gaming Association）周二表示，本周日两届卫冕冠军堪萨斯城酋长队（Kansas City Chiefs）和费城老鹰队（Philadelphia Eagles）之间的超级碗对决，将在美国合法投注创纪录的 13.9 亿美元。【原文：A record $1.39 billion will be legally wagered in the United States on Sunday's Super Bowl match-up between the two-times defending champion Kansas City Chiefs and Philadelphia Eagles, the American Gaming Association said on Tuesday.】
